Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.collection

Class ResourceCollection

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.collection.Collection
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.collection.ResourceCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Equatable
public class ResourceCollection extends Collection
Represents any FHIRPath expression which refers to a resource type.
Author:
John Grimes
